channel.title: Nonfixable Error
channel.description:
Ok I have an error whenever I try to run my server here it is: [Code]HiddenScape server ----------------------------------------------------------
Loading npcs... - HiddenScape - .. Online! drops... spawn list...done! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:167) at server.main(server.java:101) [/code] Here is the link to download my client.java and item.java [url=http://uppit.com/OQUD7B]http://uppit.com/OQUD7B[/url] they are the 2 files i edited that made this error occur if you find a solution tell me thanks

item.title: Nonfixable Error
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Linksys, post:7, topic:235387”]no its ::mypos
if you can try to hep me with my other dilemma[/quote]

What other problems do you have?

Read full topic

item.title: Nonfixable Error
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

now it does this:

[code] HiddenScape server

Loading npcs… - HiddenScape -
… Online!
drops… spawn list…done!
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “1
5333 Armadyl_Godsword A_beautiful,_heavy_sword. 31232321”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:167)
at server.main(server.java:101)
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Nonfixable Error
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Linksys, post:1, topic:235387”]Ok I have an error whenever I try to run my server here it is: [Code]HiddenScape server

Loading npcs… - HiddenScape -
… Online!
drops… spawn list…done!
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:167)
at server.main(server.java:101)
[/code]
Here is the link to download my client.java and item.java http://uppit.com/OQUD7B
they are the 2 files i edited that made this error occur if you find a solution tell me thanks[/quote]

If you’ve recently added new items into your item.cfg, go look for it. Count how many bonus’ it has, and compare the amount of bonus’ to your other items, and add/remove the needed/unneeded bonus’.

Read full topic
